#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define gi(x) scanf("%d",&x)
int main(){
	int t,x,y;
	gi(t);
	int test=1;
	while(t--){
		gi(x);
		gi(y);
		int a[50000];
		int b[50000];
		memset(a,0,sizeof(a));
		memset(b,0,sizeof(b));
		int my=0;
		while(y>0){
			b[my]=y%10;
			y/=10;
			my++;
		}
		//cout<<"my "<<my<<endl;
		int ans;
		a[0]=1;
		int m=1;
		int exp=0;
		while(1){
			int temp=0;
			int p;
			for(int i=0;i<m;i++){
				p=a[i]*x+temp;
				a[i]=p%10;
				temp=p/10;
			}
			while(temp>0){
				a[m++]=temp%10;
				temp/=10;
			}
			exp++;
			/*
			for(int i=0;i<m;i++){
				cout<<a[m-1-i];
			}
			cout<<endl;
			*/

			if(m>=my){
				int i=my-1;
				int j=m-1;
				int count=0;
				while(i>=0){
					if(b[i]==a[j]){
						count++;
					}
					else{
						break;
					}
					i--;
					j--;
				}
				if(count==my){
					ans=exp;
					break;
				}

			}
		}
		printf("Case %d: %d\n",test,ans);
		test++;
	}
}
